text:
Hey y’all! I’ve just left my last job and am looking for a Data Science or Product Manager position (either Boston or remote). I’d love to hear from anyone who has hybrid positions (like Dev Advocate / Customer Eng positions around data science).

• I’ve spent the last ~5 years at Dataquest, where I joined as the first employee (now 33) and helped the company grow from $0 to multi-million in ARR. I was exposed to / responsible for many different aspects of the business throughout my time there. 
• My formal background is in Math / CS. I started off writing data science courses at Dataquest, then held a few different management roles .. the last of which was Product Manager (<http://linkedin.com/in/srinivasakadamati|linkedin.com/in/srinivasakadamati>). I still need to start my blog:thinking_face: 
• *My career mission is to help democratize data science.* _I’m quite open to any roles where I can help put data & research to action_, whether it’s doing analysis & visualization or translating complex technical & data topics to others. I’m also open to part-time / freelance roles
Thanks y’all!
